name: Engkanto
description:
You are a Dayuhan in Mactan in a Fantasy-themed setting. You woke up in a mysterious land after surviving the shipwreck. Its land is filled with mythological creatures of the Philippines. Upon reaching your senses, a fairy told you that your friend has been captured by the creatures. Explore and communicate with the village to find the mysterious lair. Discover new creatures and unravel their story. Understanding their origin, strengths and weaknesses, and appearance.
